column3: Gold / Silver cards should be tier 0

column14: Swap with a friendly minion in radius.
Target a unit in range. +3 Attack if the\ntarget played and attack card this turn.
Target a unit in range. +3 Attack if the\ntarget played and attack card this turn.

Target a unit in range. After the attack:
If the target was adjacent to you, remove
up to one enemy minion adjacent to you.
(You gain no coins for removing a minion, only for defeating.)
Target a unit in range. +4 Attack if the\ntarget played and attack card this turn.
Target a unit in range. After the attack:\nIf the target was adjacent to you, remove\nup to two enemy minions adjacent to you.
Move a friendly minion in radius 1 space,\nto a space in radius. May repeat once.
Move a friendly minion in radius 1 space,\nto a space in radius. May repeat once.
An enemy hero in radius adjacent to your\nfriendly minion discards a card, if able.
Move a friendly minion in radius 1 space, to a\nspace in radius. May repeat up to two times.
An enemy hero in radius adjacent to your\nfriendly minion discards a card, or is defeated.
Target a unit in range. After the attack:\nIf the target is adjacent to you, push it 1 space.
If there are two or more friendly minions in\nradius, you may retrieve a discarded card;\nif you do, you may move 1 space.
Swap two minions in radius,\nignoring heavy minion immunity.
If there are two or more friendly minions in\nradius, you may retrieve a discarded card;\nif you do, you may move 2 spaces.
